Package ohos.agp.graphics

Interface SurfaceOps


  • public interface SurfaceOps
    Provides methods of adding or removing a callback for a surface Ops.

    This interface is implemented by users.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  SurfaceOps.Callback
      Represents the callback of the surface ops.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCallback​(SurfaceOps.Callback callback)
      Adds the callback of a surface ops.
      Surface getSurface​()
      Obtains the surface held by the surface ops.
      Rect getSurfaceDimension​()
      Obtains the dimension of this surface.
      Canvas lockCanvas​()
      Locks the Canvas of a surface ops to enable drawing on the canvas.
      void removeCallback​(SurfaceOps.Callback callback)
      Removes the callback of a surface ops.
      void setFixedSize​(int width, int height)
      Sets a fixed size for the surface.
      void setFormat​(int format)
      Sets the pixel format of the surface.
      void setKeepScreenOn​(boolean isOn)
      Sets whether the screen is always on.
      void unlockCanvasAndPost​(Canvas canvas)
      Releases a lockCanvas() instance and displays it on the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • addCallback

        void addCallback​(SurfaceOps.Callback callback)
        Adds the callback of a surface ops.
        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback of the surface ops.

      • removeCallback

        void removeCallback​(SurfaceOps.Callback callback)
        Removes the callback of a surface ops.
        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback of the surface ops.

      • setFormat

        void setFormat​(int format)
        Sets the pixel format of the surface.
        Parameters:
        format - Indicates the pixel format of the surface.

      • lockCanvas

        Canvas lockCanvas​()
        Locks the Canvas of a surface ops to enable drawing on the canvas.
        Returns:
        Returns the canvas of the surface ops.

      • unlockCanvasAndPost

        void unlockCanvasAndPost​(Canvas canvas)
        Releases a lockCanvas() instance and displays it on the screen.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Indicates the canvas to release.

      • getSurface

        Surface getSurface​()
        Obtains the surface held by the surface ops.
        Returns:
        Returns the surface held by the surface ops.

      • setFixedSize

        void setFixedSize​(int width,
                  int height)
        Sets a fixed size for the surface.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width of the surface.
        height - Indicates the height of the surface.
        Since:
        3

      • setKeepScreenOn

        void setKeepScreenOn​(boolean isOn)
        Sets whether the screen is always on.
        Parameters:
        isOn - Specifies whether the screen is always on. True indicates that the screen is always on; False indicates that the screen is not always on.
        Since:
        3

      • getSurfaceDimension

        Rect getSurfaceDimension​()
        Obtains the dimension of this surface.
        Returns:
        Returns a Rect object describing the surface dimension. The values of left and top in this object are always 0.
        Since:
        3
